## AlexaPlatformData.distributionCountries property

Part of the Alexa Skill Manifest publishing information, when isAvailableWorldwide is false this must be specified. It is an array of ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format country strings where the skill can be distributed.

See [https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html\#publishinginformation](https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html#publishinginformation)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
distributionCountries?: string[];
```
